title: New: Lauren Ruth Ward – Did I Offend You?
body:
There’s so much personality to the vocal on this latest track from LA’s **Lauren Ruth Ward**.

_Did I Offend You?_ feels searingly honest, merging the raw power of Angel Olsen and the beautiful fragility of Sharon Van Etten, it’s an emotionally explosive three minutes, gripping right to the end. Check it out below.

excerpt.full: There’s so much personality to the vocal on this latest track from LA’s Lauren Ruth Ward. Did I Offend You? feels searingly honest, merging the raw power of Angel Olsen and the beautiful fragility of Sharon Van Etten, it’s an emotionally explosive three minutes, gripping right to the end. Check it out below.
excerpt.short: There's so much personality to the vocal on this latest track from LA's Lauren Ruth Ward.
